articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to KPA Designing Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to KPA Designing Institute
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Designing Institute of the Korean People's Army.
					 He went round the room which houses revolutionary relics.
					
					 Looking at historic relics and data with keen attention, he recollected with deep emotion the proud road covered by the institute.
					
					 He said that looking at the diary of the leadership provided by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the designing institute alone, one can know well about the construction history of our country, adding that their immortal exploits performed in leading  construction would shine long as an eternal treasure for building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 He underlined the need for the institute to arrange well the room for the education in the revolutionary history and help its officials, designers and architects deeply grasp the leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Going round various designing rooms, he indicated tasks to be fulfilled by the institute.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the party to create a new history of construction in Songun Korea, he noted, instructing the institute to play a pioneer's role in the drive to develop the present heyday in construction into a period of great prosperity.
					
					 In order to successfully carry out any task assigned by the party, it is important for the designing personnel to aim high and have ambitious pluck to make architectural designs to be impeccable even in the distant future, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that in order to decisively raise the level of scientization in designing as required by the new century it is necessary to put designing methods on a scientific basis and modernize designing means.
					
					 Underling the need to spruce up the interior and exterior of the institute as befitting an organ producing designs for a highly civilized nation, he took measures for doing so. 
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held
articles.content:
Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of awarding state commendations for Juche 102 (2013) took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Saturday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairpersons of the provincial people's committees, officials of the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions and service personnel, workers and officials who made great contributions to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Participants of the grand workshop for officials in the field of construction were present there as observers.
					
					 Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to Unit 267 of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Sangwon Cement Complex which performed shining feats in successfully building monumental edifices in the era of Songun.
					
					 Order of Kim Jong Il, the title of DPRK Labor Hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class, Kim Jong Il Prize, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize, honorary titles and Order of National Flag First Class were conferred on service personnel, workers and officials who performed distinguished feats in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung and citations of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and supreme commander of the KPA, went to persons of merit.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Awards Citations to Service Personnel, People and Officials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Awards Citations to Service Personnel, People and Officials
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un awarded citations to service personnel, people and officials who contributed to glorifying this as a year of gigantic creation and changes by performing feats in the efforts for  bolstering up the revolutionary forces, building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living.
					 He awarded citations to Kim Kwang Jin, Pak Chang Gol and 11 other  persons in the name of the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and to Son Sung Il, Jon Yong Min and 12 other persons in the name of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Watches Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Awarded to Meritorious People
articles.content:
Watches Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Awarded to Meritorious People
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were conferred on servicepersons, workers and officials who distinguished themselves in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation at the "speed on Masik Pass" under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Watches were awarded to Han Song, Pak Yong Su, Ri Sok Chol and 19 other persons.

articles.title: Commendations Awarded to Meritorious People
articles.content:
Commendations Awarded to Meritorious People
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Commendations were conferred on those who performed shining labor feats at major worksites for building a thriving nation, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to Kim Jong Gwan and So Jae Guk, the title of Labour Hero of the DPRK, gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag to Chae Kon, Yang Chol Ung, Ho Un Song and 13 other persons, Kim Jong Il Prize to Ri Phung Sun and Pak Min Yol, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to Ri Chong Chol, Ryom Kwang Myong and 7 other persons and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Hong Hyon Il, Pak Kwang Nam and 4 other persons.
					
					 The title of People's Scientist was conferred to Ri Jong Gwa, that of People's Artist to Sin Pong Hwa, that of People's Athlete to Yun Won Chol, Om Yun Chol and Pak Yong Bom and titles of merit to 70 persons of merit in the sectors of architecture, science and technology, electricity and coal industries, education and the press.
					
					 Order of National Flag First Class went to 91 persons.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by Vice-Chairman Kim Wan Su came back home on Saturday after taking part in the Sixth Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly held in Pakistan.

articles.title: New Songs Favored in DPRK
articles.content:
New Songs Favored in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Songs recently created in the DPRK are very popular among local people, capturing their hearts.
					 The songs successfully represent the firm faith and will of the Korean People's Army (KPA) servicepersons and people to hold in high esteem the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The song "We Will Follow You Only" vividly depicts with its passionate rhythms and convincing lyrics that nothing can remove the reverence for Kim Jong Un from the hearts of the Korean people and their destiny and rosy future would have been unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Clearly shown in the song are the firm conviction of the KPA servicepersons and the people that the destiny of the nation can be safe and its happiness brought into full bloom only when it is led by Kim Jong Un, and their determination to always remain loyal to his leadership, sharing the same destiny with him.
					
					 The song "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" makes clear that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will as ever defend Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The songs become more favorite among the KPA servicepersons and people, since they were created at a time when the revolutionary ranks have become purer with the purge of the anti-party, counter-revolutionary factionists by a resolute decision of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: New Stamps Released in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Released in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamps with the approach of the 2nd anniversary of the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il (December 17).
					 Seen on the upper parts of the stamps are letters "The great leader comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and "Juche 100 (2011) - Juche 102 (2013)".
					
					 The stamps respectively feature a photo of Kim Jong Il giving guidance to a shelling drill of a unit of the Korean People's Army and a photo of him looking at vinalon cotton at the February 8 Vinalon Complex.
					
					 The stamps remind people of the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to turning the DPRK into a country powerful in ideological, political and military fields, ensuring the wellbeing of the people and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by O Hyong Jin, permanent adviser to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here on Saturday to take part in the memorial service to be held on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Struggle of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Struggle of Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place during the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students. 
					 The youth and students delegation of the DPRK took part in the meeting and seminars held on the themes of "Unity and cooperation in youth struggle for peace, sovereignty and solidarity", "Crisis of capitalism, conditions of young people and prospect of social change", "Imperialists' blockade to economically stifle other countries", etc. 
					
					 Members of the DPRK delegation made speeches under the titles including "To put an end to the imperialists' aggression and war moves is the urgent demand for building independent and peaceful new world" and "It is the irresistible trend of the times to advance towards socialism", etc. 
					
					 They said it is the law to govern the development of history for the people to advance along the road of socialism, calling upon the progressive youth desirous of independence to resolutely smash the anti-socialist moves of the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 Youth and student delegates from different countries hoped that the Korean people including youth would win victories only in the struggle against imperialism and renewed their will to boost support and solidarity for their struggle. 
					
					 Meanwhile, an international solidarity forum in support of the Korean people and youth for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country was held on Dec. 11. 
					
					 The forum adopted an appeal to the world progressive youth and students organizations. 
					
					 The appeal expressed full support for the principled stand of the DPRK government to achieve durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and its fair and aboveboard proposals for reunification and the struggle of the Korean people. 
					
					 The appeal underlined the need to launch positive international solidarity activities for bitterly denouncing the hostile policy towards the DPRK pursued by the U.S., the root cause of escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula, and its moves for a nuclear war, and urging the U.S. to immediately withdraw all the aggression forces including nuclear war hardware from south Korea. 
					
					 It expressed the belief that the world progressive youth and students would further boost the international solidarity in support of the just struggle of the Korean people for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the forum.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Int'l Forum
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Int'l Forum 
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Wednesday received a letter from the delegations and delegates of youth and students organizations of different countries to the international solidarity forum supporting the struggle of the Korean people and youth for independent and peaceful reunification of the country held in Ecuador. 
					 The letter said that the solidarity forum marked an important occasion which helped know correctly what is the root cause of pain of the Korean people who have been subject to tragedy of national division for nearly 70 years contrary to the aspiration of mankind and the demand of the times, who sincerely hopes for justice and peace on the Korean Peninsula and who brings disaster of a nuclear war to it. 
					
					 Now the world progressive youth and students extend firm solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people and youth advancing under the leadership of the peerlessly great man and are convinced of its final victory, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 The participants remaining true to the firm anti-imperialist idea will as ever struggle to the last against the aggression and war moves of the world reactionaries led by the U.S. imperialists and send full support to the DPRK's peace-loving efforts. 
					
					 The cause of the Korean people and youth striving to ensure durable peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and win the final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un is sure to be realized.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Sophism against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Sophism against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Recently Joseph Baiden, vice-president of the United States, said "north Korea can never achieve security and prosperity so long as it pursues nuclear weapons."
					 This is sophism that could be made by an impudent burglar. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that intentionally hinders other countries' efforts for stability and prosperity in international arena.
					
					 As the world's biggest nuclear-weapons state and nuclear blackmailer, the U.S. existence itself has become a main factor of rendering the international situation tense and a stumbling block to the development of the progressive countries.
					
					 The U.S. was the first in the world to develop nuclear weapons and use them, inflicting nuclear disaster on many people. It is still now engaged in nuclear blackmail against other countries, scheming to dominate the world by dint of nukes. 
					
					 In its "four-year defense strategy report" worked out in 2010, the U.S. stressed the need to keep up its nuclear arsenal. This clearly showed that it had no intention to abandon nuclear weapons.
					
					 It conducted a series of sub-critical nuclear tests in recent years alone and tests for examining the capacity of nukes based on plutonium this year. 
					
					 Meanwhile it is planning to update B-61 nuclear bombs till 2024 with expenditure of 8 billion dollars.
					
					 Such moves are a heinous crime as they fan up the nuclear arms race and nuclear threat worldwide and hinder the development of international community.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for the U.S., which has a great number of nukes enough to destroy the entire mankind several hundred times and has hindered the global peace, stability and prosperity with them, to talk about "security and prosperity", pulling up the DPRK over its nuclear deterrent for self-defense. 
					
					 The U.S. continued accusation of the DPRK over its nuclear deterrent is only aimed to disarm the latter and then realize the ambition for stifling it as well as to justify the scheme for nuclear modernization.
					
					 Such gangster-like acts against the sovereign states aspiring after independence, progress and prosperity can never be tolerated.
					
					 No matter how desperate the U.S. become in its anti-DPRK moves, the DPRK will invariably go along the road chosen by itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats of Great Significance in National History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats of Great Significance in National History
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man and outstanding brilliant Songun commander who firmly protected the destiny and future of the nation from stern ordeals and storms, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The 1990s in the past century was a period of stern ordeals unforgettable in the history of the country and the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 In the grim period when the destiny of the country and the nation was at the crossroads of life and death, Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun. So, the Korean people could pave a wide avenue for prosperity despite grim ordeals and adversity though others might fall a hundred times.
					
					 He brought about a turning phase in the movement for national reunification by resolutely shattering the moves of foreign forces for domination and interference, aggression and war with his invincible Songun politics. Having short and uncomfortable sleep and eating rice balls, he ceaselessly made long and difficult journeys to inspect the front, forefront posts including Panmunjom and Mt. Osong. He thus consolidated the defence line of the country as firm as a rock and decisively foiled confrontation hysteria of the warmongers.
					
					 He provided the north-south summit and the June 15 joint declaration for the first time in the more than half a century-long history of national division just before the beginning of the new century and ushered in the era of independent reunification in which the Korean nation advanced, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself". This is the great feat of national historic significance performed by him for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The dynamic advance of the era of independent reunification and the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, under the reliable protection of the Songun politics helped lay a foundation for putting the cause of national reunification on a high stage.

articles.title: Papers Slam Biden's Northeast Asia Junket
articles.content:
Papers Slam Biden's Northeast Asia Junket
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- U.S. Vice-President Biden toured Japan, China and south Korea from Dec. 2 to 7.
					 Papers Saturday observe in commentaries that Biden's tour of Northeast Asia was aimed at officially declaring once again the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific policy to hold its military supremacy in the region and drawing closer Japan and south Korea to this end.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:  It is the U.S. final aim to contain the DPRK and its neighboring countries by force of arms and hold supremacy in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, realize its ambition for world domination.
					
					 Lurking behind the new defense strategy announced by the U.S. last year is a sinister aim to lay a siege to a big power in Asia and militarily contain it so that it can not grow to be opposed to the U.S.
					
					 In order to ensure its military edge in the Asia-Pacific region, the U.S. is bolstering up military capabilities and, at the same time, attaching great importance to tightening the military alliance for aggression with its followers.
					
					 It was one of the objectives of Biden's visit this time to coordinate the relations between Japan and south Korea, its junior allies and servants. 
					
					 The U.S. desperate efforts to hold a military edge in Northeast Asia would only bring misfortune to it.
					
					 Minju Joson says: We cannot but take a serious note of the anti-DPRK remarks made by Biden in south Korea. Force of arms is not a monopoly of the U.S. and the DPRK will never be taken in by the poor trick of the U.S.

articles.title: 2013, Year of Struggle of S. Korean People against Fascist Regime
articles.content:
2013, Year of Struggle of S. Korean People against Fascist Regime
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- This year people of various social strata in south Korea staged actions across south Korea to bring down the Park Geun Hye puppet regime which seized power through  illegal acts and fraud and reduced south Korea to a veritable hell by enforcing a fascist dictatorial rule.
					 More than 200 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society formed the "Emergency Situation Council to Denounce Intelligence Service's (IS) Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation" and staged candlelight actions against the "government".
					
					 Candlelight rallies took place in over 10 cities including Seoul, Pusan, Taegu, Kwangju and Taejon on June 28 in protest against the IS's illegal acts.
					
					 21 candlelight actions were staged as of November 23 in protest against the puppet conservative regime.
					
					 Large-scale candlelight rallies took place in various parts of south Korea on August 10 with more than 100 000 people from all walks of life attending.
					
					 The waves of the  campaign for issuing declarations on the situation censuring the conservative ruling forces' election-rigging swept different parts of south Korea including Seoul, Pusan, Taegu, Ulsan and Jeju.
					
					 Interference of the Ministry of Defense and the Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency in the election was brought to light in the wake of the disclosure of the IS's election-rigging. People in south Korea became increasingly vocal demanding the regime thoroughly probe the truth behind the fraudulent election conducted with government power involved. Against this backdrop even the religious circle rose up in a protest action.
					
					 Religionists belonging to religious orders including Catholic, Christian, Buddhism, Chondoism and Round Buddhism staged a large- scale rally for issuing a declaration on the situation in protest against the present conservative "government" which seized power through a fraudulent election. Their action was followed by a mass on the situation, a prayer meeting and a candlelight struggle.
					
					 Religionists' actions took place in different parts of south Korea including Seoul and Kwangju more than 40 times with 50 000 people attending. They sent shivers down the spine of the puppet regime.
					
					 Voices denouncing the ruling forces for seizing power and calling for probing the truth behind the election rigging were heard from the "funeral for the IS" and the demonstration staged by members of the Solidarity for Progress and the Bar Association for Democratic Society, a mammoth rally of youth and students and the venues of the signature campaigns conducted by the Council of Professors for Democracy.
					
					 The waves of dynamic actions against the Park regime's moves to revive "yusin" fascist rule swept across south Korea.
					
					 This year witnessed ceaseless huge meetings, demonstrations and strikes to win back freedom and rights.
					
					 Scholars of the Society for History Studies and the Institute for Study of Historical Affairs and members of the Committee of the Students under the Democratic Party and the Committee of the Youth and Students under the Justice Party of south Korea condemned the Compilation Committee for the State History for screening and passing the history textbook written by neo-conservative-lining scholars who embellished dictators including Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee and distorted and downplayed the movement for democracy.
					
					 Civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law" formed the All-People Measure Committee for coping with the puppet regime's moves to close newspaper Jaju Minbo and waged a dynamic struggle for protecting progressive media.
					
					 As seen above, south Korea this year witnessed the manifestation of the unanimous desire and actions of the south Korean people to put an end to the fascist dictatorial rule and lead a free and worthy life that shook the puppet conservative regime to its very foundation.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Military Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Military Drill
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Hukryong unit of the south Korean marine corps recently waged a chemical, biological and radioactive war drill on Paekryong Island in the West Sea of Korea.
					 War hardware including forces and armored cars belonging to the marine corps were reportedly involved in the drill.
					
					 The warmongers keen to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK are kicking up consecutive war rackets against it.

articles.title: S. Korean Railway Workers Launch Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Railway Workers Launch Strike
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Railways Trade Union of south Korea launched an all-out strike to check the privatization of railways on Dec. 10.
					 If the authorities' privatization of railways is not checked, such public sectors as electricity and gas will turn over to the ownership of greedy big businessmen, the trade union said.
					
					 Noting the railway workers have come out for a strike despite detention and dismissal, it stressed it would make all efforts to fight against the Park Geun Hye regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Terms S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Terms S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People posted an article titled "Horrible human rights abuses on Day of World Declaration of Human Rights" on Dec. 11.
					 The article noted the World Declaration of Human Rights stipulates that anyone has the right to enjoy freedom of opinion and expression.
					
					 The International Rules of Human Rights adopted in 1966 also gives a clear exposition of the freedom of expression, it added.
					
					 However, the freedom of expression is being snubbed and becoming a target of suppression in south Korea, it noted, terming it a wanton violation of human rights.
					
					 It blamed Park Geun Hye for making remarks threatening an opposition party on Dec. 10, the Day of the World Declaration of Human Rights, adding:
					
					 It is, indeed, a violation of the World Declaration of Human Rights that the power organs are taking the lead in snubbing people's opinion and kicking up a racket of suppression.
					
					 Human rights abuses are rampant in south Korea.
					
					 No one can find out an excuse even if south Korea is termed the worst tundra of human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Denounced 
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., in an article on Dec. 11 criticized the south Korean conservative media for releasing false reports. 
					 The conservative media of south Korea have lost objectivity and truth, the article said, and went on:
					
					 When the movement demanding the resignation of the "government" is escalating in the wake of the disclosure of the fraudulent election in south Korea, Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" are  kicking up a campaign for eliminating "forces following the north," pushing the south-north relations to the worst phase. 
					
					 Taking advantage of this, the conservative media are busy releasing misinformation in disregard of objectivity and truth. 
					
					 That is why overseas Koreans do not believe in what the conservative media of south Korea reported and accuse them of "telling lies only whenever they open their mouths." 
					
					 Media without truth have no future. 
					
					 The conservative media of south Korea should fully reflect on what they have done.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Head of Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Head of Delegation of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- O Hyong Jin who is heading the delegation of Koreans in Japan was interviewed by KCNA at the airport on Saturday. The delegation arrived here to attend the memorial service to be held on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il, possessed of extraordinary wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble virtues, led the people with his profound and warm loving care, the head of the delegation said, and went on:
					
					 He gave field guidance to every part of the country.
					
					 He declined the offer for building monument to his exploits and his statue on this land, though he performed undying feats for the country and people with total dedication. He devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Socialism has been firmly defended and a solid foundation for building a thriving nation laid thanks to his wise guidance.
					
					 Recorded in the history of his Songun revolution is the great benevolence shown by him for the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He clearly indicated the way to be followed by the Juche-based movement for overseas compatriots and showed warm loving care for them.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan could live with pride and self-respect as befitting members of Kim Il Sung's nation even in an alien land as they were led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His august name and tender-hearted image are always cherished in the hearts of the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The great feats the peerlessly great man performed for the country and people, the era and history will shine long in the history of the nation.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is identical to Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership and virtues. It is the greatest fortune and happiness of all fellow countrymen to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan to firmly believe in and follow only Kim Jong Un despite any storms.
					
					 We will devote ourselves to the struggle for bringing earlier a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification, the desire of the nation, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits 
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of Russia held a remembrance meeting in the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on Wednesday to mark the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photos documenting immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un who devoted themselves to bolstering up the defense capabilities and improving the people's standard of living. 
					
					 Displayed there were photos of the service personnel and people of the DPRK paying last respects to late Kim Jong Il in bitter grief. 
					
					 Also on display there were famous works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books dealing with the undying revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Kyong Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, officials of the Koreans' organizations in Nakhodka, Partizansk and Ussuriysk cities and compatriots of social standings and the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general. 
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before a full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing on Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them in humble reverence. 
					
					 They watched a video "Korea Tells with Bitter Tears". 
					
					 Kim Kyong Ryol and others made speeches.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included remembrance meetings, book, photo and handicraft exhibitions and film shows in India, China, Singapore, Vietnam, Indonesia, Romania and Ethiopia between December 2 and 9.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un. Also displayed there were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of Koreans.
					
					 Speakers including a secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India praised Kim Jong Il for developing and enriching the Juche idea into a great idea steering the era of independence, firmly protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation with his unique Songun politics and laying an eternal foundation for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The director general of a Chinese folkart center said that the film show offered an opportunity to know better about Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the people, praising him as popular leader who devoted himself to the happiness of the people, mixing with them all his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Senat Ship and Trading Private Limited Co. of Singapore stressed that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding statesman who made a great contribution to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people, the cause of national reunification and global peace.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted in the event held in India.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar in Russia, a remembrance meeting in Norway, a remembrance meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show in Switzerland on December 6 and 7.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting the immortal revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il. Also displayed there were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched a Korean film documenting Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					  T. N. Esikova, chairwoman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia", said that Kim Jong Il serves as an ever-lasting banner of the world socialist movement as he decisively frustrated the vicious aggressive moves of the imperialist allied forces and honorably defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, noted that Kim Jong Il was the greatest man, peerless patriot, outstanding thinker and theoretician and master of leadership.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said that Kim Jong Il was a distinguished statesman who successfully led the revolutionary cause of Juche with his distinguished foresightedness.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on Nov. 27 devoted a full page to an article titled "The eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He is the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, the article said, adding that he established the state machinery system with the NDC as its pivot, firmly ensured the legal foundation of the Songun politics and thus provided a cornerstone for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Gorkha Express on Dec. 2 carried an article titled "The aim of Songun politics" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Noting Kim Jong Il led the service personnel and people of the DPRK to victory under the banner of Songun since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guard Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960, it introduced in detail the essence and vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Weekly Industry on Dec. 1 carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will always live", which said:
					
					 In the sudden demise of Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, the world lost the most prominent great man.
					
					 He will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humanity.
					
					 Another Bangladeshi paper Natun Bangla on Dec. 1 in an article titled "Legacies bequeathed by leader Kim Jong Il" lauded his greatness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place in Russia, Mexico and Guinea from Dec. 3 to 7 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the Maritime Territorial Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Workers' Party of Mexico, Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Guinean Art College and masses.
					
					 The second secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee praised Kim Jong Il for his revolutionary career and exploits for the development of socialist Korea and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee who is also the chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who developed the Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence with his profound ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The head of the fine arts faculty of Guinean Art College said the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the era and history will shine long.

articles.title: ITAR-TASS Reports about Brisk Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
ITAR-TASS Reports about Brisk Construction in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS on Dec. 8 reported that construction is progressing apace in the DPRK.
					 It said:
					
					 There sprang up the modern Okryu Children's Hospital in the capital city of the DPRK.
					
					 Soldier-builders dynamically stepped up the construction of the hospital amid the playing of patriotic songs and folk songs by working in shifts day and night.
					
					 The hospital represents the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea for the rising generation.
					
					 The interior and exterior of the hospital were arranged to suit the children's mind.
					
					 Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un initiated the construction of the hospital and personally led it.
					
					 A hot wind of construction is sweeping in Pyongyang, which will turn into a city where the socialist ideal comes true, and in other areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The construction of an airport is progressing apace in the capital city. The construction of a world-class ski resort is now under way at the final phase.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian committee for remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was formed on Dec. 10.
					 Norodom Arun Rasmey, chairwoman of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia, was elected chairwoman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the undying revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and give wide publicity to them between Dec. 10 and 20.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Australia Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Australia Here
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia headed by Chairman Pak Yong Ha arrived here on Saturday to attend the memorial service to be held on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Instituto de Diseno de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Instituto de Diseno de EPC
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Instituto de Diseno del EPC.
					Estuvo primero en la sala de conservacion de objetos de interes historico-revolucionario.
					
					Viendo atentamente los objetos y datos exhibidos, recordo con emocion la orgullosa trayectoria recorrida por el instituto.
					
					Al ver solo las notas diarias de la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre el instituto, se puede conocer bien la historia de construccion de nuestra patria, dijo y agrego que las indelebles hazanas de direccion de los Generalisimos sobre la construccion brillaran siempre como patrimonios para la edificacion de una patria prospera.
					
					Hay que acondicionar bien en el instituto la sala de educacion con datos de interes historico-revolucionario para que los funcionarios, disenadores y arquitectos asimilen esas hazanas, acoto.
					
					Pasando revista a varias salas de diseno, presento las tareas que se presentan ante el instituto.
					
					Al decir que crear la nueva historia de construccion de la Corea del Songun es la firme decision del partido, indico que el instituto debe desempenar el papel de vanguardia en la lucha por desarrollar el actual periodo de prosperidad abierto en la construccion como la epoca de gran prosperidad.
					
					Para cumplir perfectamente cualquier tarea asignada por el partido, los disenadores deben tener el ideal alto y la meta ambiciosa de presentar proyectos arquitectonicos que sean impecables aun en el futuro remoto, enfatizo.
					
					Dijo que para elevar decisivamente el nivel cientifico del diseno conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo, hay que asegurar el caracter cientifico de los metodos de diseno y modernizar los medios de diseno.
					
					Continuo que se debe remodelar el interior y el exterior del instituto como organo de diseno del pais civilizado y tomo las medidas para ese fin.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Jang Jong Nam, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Realizada ceremonia de condecoracion estatal del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche
articles.content:
Realizada ceremonia de condecoracion estatal del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang la ceremonia de condecoracion estatal del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche.
					A la ocasion asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los secretarios responsables de los comites provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los presidentes de los comites populares provinciales, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales y los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores y funcionarios que hicieron gran aporte a la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Participaron tambien como observadores los participantes en el gran cursillo de los funcionarios de la rama de construccion.
					
					La Orden Kim Jong Il fue concedida a la unidad no. 267 del EPC y el Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon, que realizaron meritos orgullosos en la construccion de creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun.
					
					La Orden Kim Jong Il, el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo, la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, el Premio Kim Jong Il, el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung, el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il y otros titulos honorarios y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase fueron otorgados a los militares, trabajadores y funcionarios quienes acumularon meritos excepcionales en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Fueron entregados tambien el reloj con la inscripcion del nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el diploma de honor del Primer Secretario del PTC Kim Jong Un y el otro del Comandante Supremo del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un premia a militares y civiles contribuyentes a  prosperidad de patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un premia a militares y civiles contribuyentes a  prosperidad de patria
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un premio a los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores y funcionarios que registraron nuevos milagros y meritos en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo contribuyendo a glorificar el presente ano como el de grandes creaciones y cambios. 
					Kim Kwang Jin, Pak Chang Gol y otras 11 personas recibieron el diploma de honor que lleva el nombre del Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Son Sung Il, Jon Yong Min y otras 12 personas recibieron el diploma de honor que lleva el nombre del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.

articles.title: Otorgados relojes con nombre de Kim Il Sung a benemeritos militares y civiles
articles.content:
Otorgados relojes con nombre de Kim Il Sung a benemeritos militares y civiles
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Fueron otorgados los relojes que llevan el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung a los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores y funcionarios quienes realizaron  meritos en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista avivando las llamas de creacion de la "velocidad Masikryong" bajo la direccion revolucionaria del Songun del Partido.
					Lo recibieron Han Song, Pak Yong Su, Ri Sok Chol y otros 19.
